text: The Pioche Firehouse, in Pioche in Lincoln County, Nevada, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2018. It "was recognized for its role as the headquarters for the Pioche Fire Department from 1928 to 1954, when a larger, more modern station replaced it." ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Nevada Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1928 Category:Lincoln County, Nevada
title: Pioche Firehouse
